DOC.brief_summary: Phase III , single-centre , double-blind , randomised , placebo-controlled , parallel-group trial evaluate efficacy safety oral Vitamin E ( Mixed Tocotrienol ) 6 month patient moderate ischemic stroke . 150 patient recruit .
